Title: Completely expose and criticize the towering crimes of the "Gang of Four" anti-Party clique
Designer: Yingkou All-China Federation of Trade Unions Cartoon Creation Study Group (营口市总工会漫画创作学习班)
Notes: Three-poster set exposing and criticizing the "Gang of Four" in cartoons. The names of Jiang Qing, Zhang Chunqiao, Yao Wenyuan, and Wang Hongwen have been crossed out.This is the first poster.
Theme: Gang of Four (四人帮)Jiang QingZhang ChunqiaoYao WenyuanWang HongwenLu XunChiang Kai-shek
